title: Mock Draft Episode + Hidden Facts, Ken You Believe It! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 6/14
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with another mock draft episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason team up to draft the best team possible! Hear the strategies and thought processes while the Footballers are on the clock! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for June 14th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit is available NOW

(03:15) - Co-Managing a Fantasy Football Team
(05:30) - NFL News
(11:50) - Mock Draft

Full Mock Draft Results

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
